Activity: Log in, check emails. Review and address any critical bugs reported by @Qtest-1 from the test builds that were deployed. Topic: Critical bugs identified in test builds.

Optimize build scripts for larger projects. Implement techniques to parallelize the build process and reduce build times. Research and implement distributed build systems to further accelerate the build process.

Research and implement advanced CI features, such as build promotion and artifact management. Explore options for storing and managing build artifacts (e.g., game builds, test reports, etc.).

Create a build pipeline visualization tool to monitor the status of builds and tests. Develop a dashboard that provides real-time information on the build process. Conduct a thorough review of the entire build system. Identify areas for improvement and prioritize future tasks. Document all findings and recommendations.
